title: Green and efficient synthesis of dibenzyl cyanamides and ureas with cyanamide as a block
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23693-23698

Zhongjie Wang, Yu He, Fang Wang, Yan Wang, Hui Luo, Jianglong Wu, Jinhui Yang
A method for the two-step synthesis of dibenzyl cyanamide and dibenzyl urea via cyanamide is presented.
